features: 360° Rotating Bookcase - The rotating feature allows for a complete 360-degree display, showcasing your book collection from all angles, making it eye-catching piece. The Book Display Shelf also adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to any room decor.

Size&Convenient Accessibility - The total height of the bookshelf: 24.4 inch . A total of 2 layers, each layer height: 11.8 inch . Diameter: 12.9 inch.This 2-tier rotating bookshelf is offering easy access with acrylic sides so kids can easily see and access their books or others

Space-saving -This rotating bookshelf is an excellent choice for small rooms. It maximizes storage capacity while occupying minimal floor space, making it an efficient solution for those looking to optimize their room layout.The Book Display Shelf also adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to any room decor.
Material - The Rotating Book Display is made of high-quality Wood with acrylic sides that provides great stability and durability, won't tilt or swing easily.

Versatile Application - Uyoyous wood book shelf is perfect for organizing kids' books. Additionally, it is also ideal for a classroom library, living room, bedroom, children's room, study, office and other corners

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very cute and modern touch. Holds more books than I expected and I love how you can see through the whole thing in like a glass case. Was fairly easy to assemble and had very clear instructions. Arrived earlier than expected also which is always a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This rotating bookshelf is everything I hoped it would be. It was super easy to assemble, although it is nice to have a second set of hands to hold things in place while securing the screws. It took less than 15 mins for my daughter and I to have it completely finished. I love that the panels are clear so you can see all the books but keep them all secure for rotating. It fit perfectly on my small end table by the bed. I couldn't be happier with it. The rotating base came already assembled so the only things you need to assemble is the middle shelf, top board, and the clear panels on the sides. All the screws are exactly the same. Instructions weren't even necessary since it's all very simple. I LOVE it!!
